article_title: Change on the way: 15 Springfield stories to watch in 2015

article_metadata.description: The constant theme for 2015 for Illinois, especially in Springfield, is change.The man to watch? Gov.-elect Bruce Rauner, who takes office on Jan. 12. He’ll find himself at the center of a mountain of issues: a state budget chasm, pension reforms and selling his change agenda to a Democrat-controlled legislature. At the city level, spring elections will bring fresh faces to half the city council. Five people want to be the city’s next mayor.What else does 2015 hold for Springfield?
article_metadata.author: The State Journal-Register
